mapper.select: select sdno, startdate,enddate,subject,color,place,joinemployee,content,fk_scno,fk_employeeid,fk_bcno from tbl_schedule where fk_employeeid=#{fk_employeeid} or fk_bcno= 2 or fk_bcno != 2 and joinemployee like '%'||lower(#{fk_employeeid})||'%' order by sdno desc
